33 
34 /// Assume the credentials filed of the message is empty.
35 template <typename Message>
36 struct HasEmptyCredentials
37 {
38  static constexpr bool UseCustomValue = true;
39 
40  static constexpr
41  UInt16 calculateMaxMessageSize()
42  {
43  return
44  Message::blockLength(Message::Schema::Version)
45  + MessageHeader::Size
46  + Message::getMinimalVariableFieldsSize(Message::Schema::Version);
47  }
48 };
49 
50 /// Assume the message has a constant size.
51 template <typename Message>
52 struct HasNoVariableFieldsOrGroups
53 {
54  static constexpr bool UseCustomValue = true;
55 
56  static constexpr
57  UInt16 calculateMaxMessageSize()
58  {
59  return
60  Message::blockLength(Message::Schema::Version)
61  + MessageHeader::Size;
62  }
63 };
64 
65 /// Traits for calculating the buffer size of a message.
66 template <typename Message> struct MaxMessageSizeTraits;
67
